üì± Clew

Clew is your new favorite place to store, sort, and share clippings all your favorite media, whether it's a mind-blowing plot twist in a novel, a hilarious quote in a movie or play, a devastating song lyric, a grand discovery in an article, or simply a quirky adjective you can't wait to use in your own writing.

Explore more about Clew on the website.

Or download the app for free on the App Store.
